Object Hierarchy

Prerequisites

ArvGcInteger requires GObject.

Known Implementations

ArvGcInteger is implemented by ArvGcBoolean, ArvGcConverter, ArvGcEnumeration, ArvGcIntegerNode, ArvGcRegisterNode, ArvGcStructEntryNode and ArvGcSwissKnife.
